sources.title: Officer Down - Dirty Copland - Crime, Action - Jetzt den ganzen Film kostenlos schauen bei Moviedome
sources.description:
Abonniere #Moviedome kostenlos für mehr #ganzeFilme ► http://bit.ly/MoviedomeAbo

Jetzt den Crime Action - Film „Officer Down - Dirty Copland“ in ganzer Länge bei #Moviedome sehen.

►Zum Film:
Stephen Dorff, James Woods, Stephen Lang, Dominic Purcell: Dieser Film wartet mit vielen namhaften Schauspielern aus dem Action-Bereich auf!

►Die Handlung:
Weil bei einer Drogenrazzia so einiges schief läuft, wird der Polizist David Callahan angeschossen und unerwartet von einem Fremden gerettet. Callahan kann von vorne anfangen, und ein paar Dinge in seinem verkorksten Leben richten, doch dann meldet sich der Fremde wieder. Diesmal braucht er die Hilfe des Polizisten, denn er will die junge Stripperin Zhanna Dronov retten.

James Woods (bekannt aus „John Carpenter’s Vampires“, „Videodrome“) als Captain Verona

metadata.Plot: In Bridgeport, Connecticut, Detective David 'Cal' Callahan is a family man, married to Alexandra with a teenage daughter, Lanie. Cal has an unscrupulous past, drug and alcohol addicted, and he was reborn when he was shot by a drug dealer and saved by a stranger. When a stranger meets Cal in a bar, he tells Cal that he was the one who saved him and gives the journal of his deceased daughter to Cal. He tells Cal that she committed suicide after she was beaten up and raped by Angel, a regular at the night-club where she danced, owned by the drug dealer Royce Walker. Cal investigates Angel and when he sees the man in his car in front of the school where Lanie studies, he believes that Angel is a pedophile and Cal decides to take action. But he finds that he is a marionette and someone is pulling the strings and watching him dance.
metadata.Actors: Stephen Dorff, Stephen Lang, David Boreanaz
